Key:
Kaguya and Yuzuru need to talk with me.
I wonder what it's about.

(I ran up to the rooftop. The twins wrote me a
message saying we needed to discuss something
in person, and to meet them on the roof.)
I have a feeling... I know what this will be about.
I've been waiting for you, Shido.
Awaiting. Thank you for coming, Shido.
Sorry if I kept you. So, let's talk.

(The two looked at one another in contemplation.
A silence floated between us, but Kaguya took a
step forward.)

I really came to terms with my feelings during
our last date. Shido, spending time as the three
of us has been fun, but...

I realize just how much I really like you.
I was hoping maybe you felt the same way.
In the end, I hoped you would choose me.

Monopoly. When Kaguya had informed me,
I was surprised, but I agree with her sentiment.
I want you as a boyfriend for myself.

(The two looked at one another in contemplation.
A silence floated between us, but Yuzuru took a
step forward.)

Flashback. Our most recent date was rather
wonderful. Spending time alone with you, Shido,
satisfied me greatly.

Confession. I love you, Shido. I relish the
thought of being in your company. Choose me.

I feel the same way. It was fun to run around
as a trio, but I want even more time with you,
Shido.
This has to change.

(I felt as though we had run into this problem
before, but this time, there were serious
feelings to consider on all sides.)

(Both of them looked dead serious. I'm sure
Kaguya and Yuzuru have thought long and
hard about it. More than I could imagine.)

(Because they posed the questions, I need
to return an answer. No half-assed responses.
They wouldn't accept anything less.)

Sorry. I haven't been a good boyfriend, have I?
I wasn't enough to satisfy you both.
That's not it! We're just being selfish!

Request. No matter what, I wish that you would
choose, Shido. Choose one of us.
Y-You guys...?! H-Hey!

Now answer me, Shido. Who among us gets
your heart beating fastest?! She will be the
one most deserving of your love.

Affirmative. It has to be whomever you have
made a more intimate connection with.

(They blushed, pressing my hands against
their chests. I could feel each twin's heart
beat.)

(No... It was my heartbeat. This is all so
sudden. What's going on here...?)

Suggestion. Instead of the faster heartbeat,
you can choose whomever has a bigger chest.

HEY! It's obvious you'd win that category,
Yuzuru! Shido, small ones aren't too bad.
Plus there's always the chance it'll grow!

Objection. Choosing a larger pair now
guarantees pleasure for the future. It
would be disappointing if hers never grew.

They're not that small! Besides, once you fall
in love, chest size doesn't even matter! Right,
Shido?!

Well, Kaguya, yours is plenty... Wait.
What am I even saying? Ladies, hold on
a minute. I don't know what's going on.

...I'll never let you go. Until you choose, I'll
hang on forever, Shido.
Request. Shido, please tell us whom you prefer.
Okay, I'll give it some thought...

(I took deep breaths, getting over the sense
of unease. I listened to each girls' heartbeat.
Soon, I felt calm, and I picked...)
...I think Kaguya's is beating quicker.
Shido, does that mean...?
Kaguya, I officially choose you as my girlfriend.

O-Okay! Hehe. Cheers. You've really made
my day.

Blessing. Congratulations, Kaguya. Shido,
do take care of Kaguya, please.
Yeah. I promise. Yuzuru, I...

Halt. You needn't offer me any apologies.
I have our memories to cherish for now.
There is nothing to forgive. You too, Kaguya.
Rgh...

Got it. I will love Shido enough for two of us,
Yuzuru.

Observation. I believe you sufficiently care
for Kaguya. I want whatever you want. If
you love her, I will accept it.
Thanks, Yuzuru.

Return. You are welcome. Hehe. What is the
matter, Kaguya? I thought you intended to
ask Shido something.
Huh? Oh, um...
I'm all ears. But just for today.

Oh, okay. Um, Shido... I want to go on a date
with just the two of us. This time, I want it to
be extremely romantic.
Romantic, huh...? Kaguya?
Wh-What, got a problem with that?!
Snicker. Romantic does not suit you, Kaguya.
Yeah. Yuzuru's right. This isn't like you.
Who cares?! Jeez, you two are a pain in the ass!

(And so, Kaguya and I started dating. I can't
wait to see what's in store for my one and
only girlfriend.)

(That doesn't mean we won't see Yuzuru
anymore. All because Yuzuru holds a special
place in my and Kaguya's hearts.)

(There are times when our relationship will
come first, but we'll always find time for the
trio. The three of us will always be close.)
I'm so spoiled...

(Yuzuru sent Kaguya and me off as we left
with our hands held together.)
I think Yuzuru's heartbeat is louder.

Verify. Shido, really? Are you sure you choose
me?

Yeah, Yuzuru. I want you. Will you go out with
me?

Affirmative. I have already stated how I feel.
This makes me very happy, Shido.

Congrats, Yuzuru. Shido might be incompetent,
but it was enough to win you over.

Objection. Kaguya, you needn't play off your
disappointment. I know you care for Shido as
much as I do. Are you holding back, Kaguya?

It's okay! We talked about this all yesterday!
I'm happy Shido chose you, Yuzuru...
Well, of course I'm a little disappointed...
Sorry, Kaguya...

Oh. No need to apologize! I mean it!
Wah, Yuzuru. Shido is so mean.

Concern. There, there. Shido has his cruel
moments. As his girlfriend, I will reprimand
him later.
Rgh. Shido. Yuzuru is being mean!
Okay. Then, as her boyfriend, I'll―

Forget it! Jeez, you guys. You're practically
perfect for each other. It's annoying!

Seriously. Thank you so much, Kaguya.
Thanks for your blessing.

Hehehe. If you let me hang out with you
from time to time, I'll let it slide.

Affirmative. Of course. Kaguya, I consider you
a precious, precious person to me.
Agreed.

*hiccup*... You don't have to try to cheer me
up! I mean, you're dating now. Don't you have
something to ask Shido, Yuzuru?

Request. Correct. Well, Shido. As your partner,
this is the first question I shall pose to you.
Will you take me on a date?
Of course.
Now, now. Hurry up, or the day will be over!
Yeah. See you tomorrow, Kaguya.
Flattery. See you tomorrow, Kaguya.

Yeah, I'll see you tomo―Hey, wait
Yuzuru.

Don't you plan to come home?!
NO! YOU CAN'T DO THAT!
Hahaha... Haha...
Laugh. Hehehe...

(With the hand of the one I love in mine,
I pondered where the day would take us.)

(From then on, Yuzuru and I became a couple.
I looked forward to spending time with my
one and only girlfriend.)

(That doesn't mean we won't see Kaguya
anymore. All because Kaguya holds a special
place in my and Yuzuru's hearts.)

(There are times when our relationship will
come first, but we'll always find time for the
trio. The three of us will always be close.)
I'm so spoiled...

(As Kaguya screamed in objection, Yuzuru and I
left hand in hand!)
